name: IOGT International
goal: IOGT International’s vision is a life for all human beings free to live up to their fullest potential, and free from harm caused by alcohol and other drugs. It’s a world of peace, democracy and justice where free and healthy citizens actively contribute in all levels of society.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Competition, Culture, Customs, Development, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, External Relations, Home Affairs, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Taxation, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives: IOGT International follows the EU's initiatives in public health, trade, internal market, fundament rights, social and employment policy, agriculture and international aid - both as these policy areas pertain to activities of the European Commission and the European Parliament.
